name: Force-Grown Drones

specialRules.name: Shield
specialRules.description: Stands in this Regiment, including Character Stands, count their Defense Characteristic as 1 point higher against all Hits originating from the Regiment's front Arc.

specialRules.name: Support (2)
specialRules.description: This Regiment's Stands contribute 2 Supporting Attacks during a Clash Action instead of 1.

specialRules.name: Purposefully Mindless
specialRules.description: While a Character Stand is attached to this Regiment, the Regiment always uses the highest Resolve Characteristic in the Regiment, including modifiers, even when Broken.

specialRules.name: Standard Bearer
specialRules.description: The Regiment's Command Stand includes a Standard Bearer.

officerUpgrades: Any Force Grown Drone Regiment may take the following Officers: Catabolic Node (20 points)

specialRules.name: Fly
specialRules.description: A Regiment containing only Stands with this Special Rule can March and Charge over other Regiments, regardless of whether they are Engaged, as well as Impassable and Garrison Terrain, provided the Regiment does not end its Activation overlapping any Regiments or Impassable Terrain.

specialRules.name: Irregular
specialRules.description: This Regiment does not affect Friendly and Enemy Reinforcement Lines. A Stand without this Special Rule may not join this Regiment.

specialRules.name: Lethal Demise
specialRules.description: For every Wound allocated to a Stand with this Special Rule as a result of a failed Defense Roll, the Enemy Regiment in contact with the Stand's Regiment that caused the Hits suffers a Hit.

specialRules.name: Barrage (5) (14", Rapid Volley)
specialRules.description: A Stand with this Special Rule contributes 5 Shots when its Regiment performs a Volley Action. When a Stand with this Special Rule performs a Volley Action, each Hit Roll of "1" causes an additional automatic Hit on the Target.

specialRules.name: Fluid Formation
specialRules.description: This Regiment may perform a free additional Reform Action during its Activation. This free Reform Action must be performed before the Regiment takes its first Action, or at the end of its Activation after all other Actions have been resolved.

specialRules.name: Vanguard (4)
specialRules.description: When a Regiment with this Special Rule enters the Battlefield from Reinforcements, add +4 to its March Characteristic for the first March Action this Activation.

specialRules.name: Leader
specialRules.description: The Regiment's Command Stand that provides leadership to the unit.

name: Bound Clones

specialRules.name: Shield
specialRules.description: Stands in this Regiment, including Character Stands, count their Defense Characteristic as 1 point higher against all Hits originating from the Regiment's front Arc.

specialRules.name: Support (2)
specialRules.description: This Regiment's Stands contribute 2 Supporting Attacks during a Clash Action instead of 1.

specialRules.name: Leader
specialRules.description: The Regiment's Command Stand that provides leadership to the unit.

specialRules.name: Standard Bearer
specialRules.description: The Regiment's Command Stand includes a Standard Bearer.

officerUpgrades: Any Bound Clones Regiment may take one of the following Officers: Ward Preceptor (25 points), Assault Preceptor (20 points), Catabolic Node (20 points)

name: Vanguard Clones

specialRules.name: Shield
specialRules.description: Stands in this Regiment, including Character Stands, count their Defense Characteristic as 1 point higher against all Hits originating from the Regiment's front Arc.

specialRules.name: Vanguard (4)
specialRules.description: When a Regiment with this Special Rule enters the Battlefield from Reinforcements, add +4 to its March Characteristic for the first March Action this Activation.

specialRules.name: Leader
specialRules.description: The Regiment's Command Stand that provides leadership to the unit.

specialRules.name: Standard Bearer
specialRules.description: The Regiment's Command Stand includes a Standard Bearer.

officerUpgrades: Any Vanguard Clones Regiment may take one of the following Officers: Ward Preceptor (25 points), Assault Preceptor (20 points)

specialRules.name: Barrage (5) (20", Arcing Fire)
specialRules.description: A Stand with this Special Rule contributes 5 Shots when its Regiment performs a Volley Action. Until the end of this Regiment's Activation, if the Regiment has the Aimed Shot Special Rule and is not currently occupying a piece of Garrison terrain, instead of performing a Volley Action as normal it may perform the following: The Regiment suffers -1 to its Volley Characteristic until the end of the Regiment's Activation. Then the Regiment may select an Enemy Regiment in its front arc, within Barrage Range of at least one of its Stands and within Line of Sight of a Friendly Regiment and perform the Volley Action against it as if its Volley was a Clear Shot.

specialRules.name: Leader
specialRules.description: The Regiment's Command Stand that provides leadership to the unit.

specialRules.name: Standard Bearer
specialRules.description: The Regiment's Command Stand includes a Standard Bearer.

specialRules.name: Lethal Demise
specialRules.description: For every Wound allocated to a Stand with this Special Rule as a result of a failed Defense Roll, the Enemy Regiment in contact with the Stand's Regiment that caused the Hits suffers a Hit.

specialRules.name: Barrage (3) (14", Armor Piercing (1), Deadly Shot, Torrential Fire, Reprocessing Agents)
specialRules.description: A Stand with this Special Rule contributes 3 Shots when its Regiment performs a Volley Action. When a Stand with this Special Rule performs a Volley or Spellcasting Action, any Hits caused by those attacks reduce the Target Regiment's Defense by 1. When a Stand with this Special Rule performs a Volley Action, any failed Defense Roll of "6" rolled by the Target Regiment causes it to suffer 2 Wounds instead of 1. When a Stand with this Special Rule performs a Volley Action against an Enemy Regiment within Effective Range, every two successful Hit Rolls (rounding up) cause an additional automatic Hit on the Target.

specialRules.name: Reprocessing Agents
specialRules.description: At the end of this Regiment's Barrage after Defense Rolls have been made and any Wounds have been allocated to the Target Enemy Regiment by Stands with this Special Rule, that Enemy Regiment suffers a -1 to its Defense Characteristic until the end of the Round.

specialRules.name: Leader
specialRules.description: The Regiment's Command Stand that provides leadership to the unit.

specialRules.name: Cleave (1)
specialRules.description: When a Stand with this Special Rule performs a Clash or Duel Action, any Hits caused by those Attacks reduce the Target's Defense by 1 for the purposes of making Defense Rolls against those Attacks.

specialRules.name: Impact (2)
specialRules.description: Stands with this Special Rule perform Impact Attacks equal to 2.

specialRules.name: Support (2)
specialRules.description: This Regiment's Stands contribute 2 Supporting Attacks during a Clash Action instead of 1.

specialRules.name: Flawless Technique
specialRules.description: While the Regiment has the Inspired Special Rule it also gains the Flawless Strikes Special Rule.

specialRules.name: Leader
specialRules.description: The Regiment's Command Stand that provides leadership to the unit.

specialRules.name: Standard Bearer
specialRules.description: The Regiment's Command Stand includes a Standard Bearer.

name: Onslaught Drones

specialRules.name: Linebreaker
specialRules.description: A Stand with this Special Rule ignores the Shield Special Rule and Bastion (X) Draw Event, when performing a Clash or Duel Action, or when resolving Impact Attacks.

specialRules.name: Leader
specialRules.description: The Regiment's Command Stand that provides leadership to the unit.

drawEvents.name: Burnout
drawEvents.description: Stands in this Regiment gain +1 Clash and +2 March Characteristic, as well as the Decay (3) Special Rule, until the end of the Round.

officerUpgrades: Any Onslaught Drone Regiment may take the following Officers: Catabolic Node (20 points)

specialRules.name: Flurry
specialRules.description: A Stand with this Special Rule Re-Rolls all failed Hit Rolls when performing a Clash or Duel Action.

specialRules.name: Impact (3)
specialRules.description: Stands with this Special Rule perform Impact Attacks equal to 3.

specialRules.name: Oblivious
specialRules.description: Regiments with this Special Rule receive only 1 Wound for every 2 failed Morale Tests, rounding up.

specialRules.name: Unstoppable
specialRules.description: This Regiment may Re-Roll failed Charge Rolls.

specialRules.name: Barrage (3) (14", Armor Piercing (2), Deadly Shot)
specialRules.description: A Stand with this Special Rule contributes 3 Shots when its Regiment performs a Volley Action. When a Stand with this Special Rule performs a Volley or Spellcasting Action, any Hits caused by those attacks reduce the Target Regiment's Defense by 2. When a Stand with this Special Rule performs a Volley Action, any failed Defense Roll of "6" rolled by the Target Regiment causes it to suffer 2 Wounds instead of 1.

specialRules.name: Fluid Formation
specialRules.description: This Regiment may perform a free additional Reform Action during its Activation. This free Reform Action must be performed before the Regiment takes its first Action, or at the end of its Activation after all other Actions have been resolved.

specialRules.name: Impact (2)
specialRules.description: Stands with this Special Rule perform Impact Attacks equal to 2.

specialRules.name: Leader
specialRules.description: The Regiment's Command Stand that provides leadership to the unit.

specialRules.name: Cleave (2)
specialRules.description: When a Stand with this Special Rule performs a Clash or Duel Action, any Hits caused by those Attacks reduce the Target's Defense by 2 for the purposes of making Defense Rolls against those Attacks.

specialRules.name: Impact (3)
specialRules.description: Stands with this Special Rule perform Impact Attacks equal to 3.

specialRules.name: Leader
specialRules.description: The Regiment's Command Stand that provides leadership to the unit.

specialRules.name: Fluid Formation
specialRules.description: This Regiment may perform a free additional Reform Action during its Activation. This free Reform Action must be performed before the Regiment takes its first Action, or at the end of its Activation after all other Actions have been resolved.

specialRules.name: Irregular
specialRules.description: This Regiment does not affect Friendly and Enemy Reinforcement Lines. A Stand without this Special Rule may not join this Regiment.

specialRules.name: Opportunists
specialRules.description: A Stand with this Special Rule may re-roll failed Hit Rolls when performing a Clash or Volley Action against an Enemy Regiment's Flank or Rear Arc.

specialRules.name: Deadly Blades
specialRules.description: When a Stand with this Special Rule performs a Clash or Duel Action, any failed Defense Roll of "6" rolled by the Target Regiment causes it to suffer 2 Wounds instead of 1.

specialRules.name: Loose Formation
specialRules.description: When a Stand performs a Volley Action against a Regiment with this Special Rule it halves the X value in its Barrage (X) Special Rule (rounding up) to a minimum of 1. In addition, Spells will only inflict half their number of Hits (rounding up) against a Stand with this Special Rule.

specialRules.name: Brutal Impact (2)
specialRules.description: When a Stand with this Special Rule inflicts Impact Attacks, those Impact Attacks reduce the Target Enemy Regiment's Defense by 2 for the purposes of making Defense Rolls against those Impact Attacks.

specialRules.name: Flurry
specialRules.description: A Stand with this Special Rule Re-Rolls all failed Hit Rolls when performing a Clash or Duel Action.

specialRules.name: Impact (3)
specialRules.description: Stands with this Special Rule perform Impact Attacks equal to 3.

specialRules.name: Shield
specialRules.description: Stands in this Regiment, including Character Stands, count their Defense Characteristic as 1 point higher against all Hits originating from the Regiment's front Arc.

specialRules.name: Leader
specialRules.description: The Regiment's Command Stand that provides leadership to the unit.

specialRules.name: Standard Bearer
specialRules.description: The Regiment's Command Stand includes a Standard Bearer.

specialRules.name: Cleave (1)
specialRules.description: When a Stand with this Special Rule performs a Clash or Duel Action, any Hits caused by those Attacks reduce the Target's Defense by 1 for the purposes of making Defense Rolls against those Attacks.

specialRules.name: Flurry
specialRules.description: A Stand with this Special Rule Re-Rolls all failed Hit Rolls when performing a Clash or Duel Action.

specialRules.name: Terrifying (1)
specialRules.description: Regiments in contact with Stands with this Special Rule reduce their Resolve Characteristic by 1, for the purposes of making Morale Tests against Wounds taken from that Regiment.

specialRules.name: Impact (5)
specialRules.description: Stands with this Special Rule perform Impact Attacks equal to 5.

specialRules.name: Unstoppable
specialRules.description: This Regiment may Re-Roll failed Charge Rolls.

specialRules.name: Aura of Death (8)
specialRules.description: At the start of an Enemy Regiment's "Draw Command Card" step, if it is in contact with one or more Enemy Regiment with this Special Rule, it suffers 8 Hits. Wounds resulting from these Hits do not trigger Morale Tests.

specialRules.name: Barrage (10) (16", Armor Piercing (1), Deadly Shot, Torrential Fire)
specialRules.description: A Stand with this Special Rule contributes 10 Shots when its Regiment performs a Volley Action. When a Stand with this Special Rule performs a Volley or Spellcasting Action, any Hits caused by those attacks reduce the Target Regiment's Defense by 1. When a Stand with this Special Rule performs a Volley Action, any failed Defense Roll of "6" rolled by the Target Regiment causes it to suffer 2 Wounds instead of 1. When a Stand with this Special Rule performs a Volley Action against an Enemy Regiment within Effective Range, every two successful Hit Rolls (rounding up) cause an additional automatic Hit on the Target.

specialRules.name: Lethal Demise
specialRules.description: For every Wound allocated to a Stand with this Special Rule as a result of a failed Defense Roll, the Enemy Regiment in contact with the Stand's Regiment that caused the Hits suffers a Hit.

specialRules.name: Terrifying (1)
specialRules.description: Regiments in contact with Stands with this Special Rule reduce their Resolve Characteristic by 1, for the purposes of making Morale Tests against Wounds taken from that Regiment.

specialRules.name: Brutal Impact (3)
specialRules.description: When a Stand with this Special Rule inflicts Impact Attacks, those Impact Attacks reduce the Target Enemy Regiment's Defense by 3 for the purposes of making Defense Rolls against those Impact Attacks.

specialRules.name: Fearless
specialRules.description: A Regiment with this Special Rule ignores the effects of the Fearsome and Terrifying (X) Special Rules.

specialRules.name: Impact (5)
specialRules.description: Stands with this Special Rule perform Impact Attacks equal to 5.

specialRules.name: Smite
specialRules.description: Enemy Regiments count their total Defense Characteristic as 0 against Hits caused by a Stand with this Special Rule during a Clash Action.

specialRules.name: Terrifying (2)
specialRules.description: Regiments in contact with Stands with this Special Rule reduce their Resolve Characteristic by 2, for the purposes of making Morale Tests against Wounds taken from that Regiment.

specialRules.name: Unstoppable
specialRules.description: This Regiment may Re-Roll failed Charge Rolls.

specialRules.name: Barrage (10) (12")
specialRules.description: A Stand with this Special Rule contributes 10 Shots when its Regiment performs a Volley Action.

specialRules.name: Fly
specialRules.description: A Regiment containing only Stands with this Special Rule can March and Charge over other Regiments, regardless of whether they are Engaged, as well as Impassable and Garrison Terrain, provided the Regiment does not end its Activation overlapping any Regiments or Impassable Terrain.

specialRules.name: Impact (6)
specialRules.description: Stands with this Special Rule perform Impact Attacks equal to 6.

specialRules.name: Irregular
specialRules.description: This Regiment does not affect Friendly and Enemy Reinforcement Lines. A Stand without this Special Rule may not join this Regiment.

specialRules.name: Eye in the Sky
specialRules.description: Once the Regiment's Activation is completed you may choose to immediately Draw your next Command Card and reveal it. If the Command Card belongs to a Regiment that is arriving from Reinforcements this Round, you may immediately Activate it and it gains the Vanguard (4) Special Rule.

specialRules.name: Neural-Link
specialRules.description: Friendly Regiments currently within 8" Roll 2D6 and pick the highest when determining their Charge Distance.

specialRules.name: Phero-Trails
specialRules.description: The Pteraphon gains access to the Pheromone Gland Burst, Induced Lethargy and Mend Flesh Actions, as listed on the Pheromancer and Biomancer Army List Entries. The Pteraphon may perform one of them during its Activation as a free-additional Action.

specialRules.name: Mend Flesh
specialRules.description: Target Friendly Regiment within 8" of this Character Stand Heals for two Wounds. A Regiment cannot Heal as a result of Mend Flesh more than once per Round.

specialRules.name: Biomancies
specialRules.description: A Biomancer knows all of the following Biomancies at no additional cost and may resolve one Biomancy each Round: Unstable Enhancement, Harvest Essence, Catalytic Rupture, Grant Virulence, Essence Transfer.

drawEvents.name: Biotic Renewal
drawEvents.description: Roll a D6. This Regiment Heals a number of Wounds equal to the result. If the Regiment affected is not Infantry, reduce the Healing value to D3.

specialRules.name: Cleave (1)
specialRules.description: When a Stand with this Special Rule performs a Clash or Duel Action, any Hits caused by those Attacks reduce the Target's Defense by 1 for the purposes of making Defense Rolls against those Attacks.

specialRules.name: Flawless Strikes
specialRules.description: When a Stand with this Special Rule performs a Clash or Duel Action, all Hit Rolls of "1" count the Target's Defense as 0 for that Attack.

specialRules.name: Tactics
specialRules.description: May select two of the following abilities at no additional cost: 1) Suppress Pain: The Regiment this Character Stand is currently attached to gains the Bastion (1) Draw Event. 2) Overtax Nervous System: The Regiment this Character is currently attached to gains the Double Time Draw Event. 3) Disperse: The Regiment this Character is currently attached to gains the Loose Formation Special Rule.

specialRules.name: Cleave (1)
specialRules.description: When a Stand with this Special Rule performs a Clash or Duel Action, any Hits caused by those Attacks reduce the Target's Defense by 1 for the purposes of making Defense Rolls against those Attacks.

specialRules.name: Impact (3)
specialRules.description: Stands with this Special Rule perform Impact Attacks equal to 3.

specialRules.name: Barrage (4) (14", Armor Piercing (2), Deadly Shot)
specialRules.description: A Stand with this Special Rule contributes 4 Shots when its Regiment performs a Volley Action. When a Stand with this Special Rule performs a Volley or Spellcasting Action, any Hits caused by those attacks reduce the Target Regiment's Defense by 2. When a Stand with this Special Rule performs a Volley Action, any failed Defense Roll of "6" rolled by the Target Regiment causes it to suffer 2 Wounds instead of 1.

specialRules.name: Impact (3)
specialRules.description: Stands with this Special Rule perform Impact Attacks equal to 3.

specialRules.name: Ruthless Sovereigns
specialRules.description: This Character Stand's Warband may not contain more than two Regiments of Leonine Avatara and no more than two Regiments of Centaur Avatara.

specialRules.name: Hunter-Killer Teams
specialRules.description: While the Character Stand is on the Battlefield, when a Friendly Leonine Avatara Regiment performs a Volley Action against an Enemy Regiment, that Enemy Regiment becomes "Prey" until the end of the Round. When a Friendly Cavalry Regiment performs a successful Charge against a "Prey" Enemy Regiment, it gains the Impact (+2) Special Rule until the end of the Round.

specialRules.name: Pheromone Gland Burst
specialRules.description: Target Friendly Regiment within 8" of this Character Stand adds +1 to either its March or Resolve Characteristic until the end of the Round. A Regiment cannot be the target of the Pheromone Gland Burst Action more than once per Round.

specialRules.name: Induced Lethargy
specialRules.description: Target Enemy Regiment within 8" of this Character Stand suffers -1 to its Defense Characteristic (to a minimum of 1) until the end of the Round. A Regiment cannot be affected by Induced Lethargy more than once per Round.

specialRules.name: Pheromancies
specialRules.description: A Pheromancer knows all the following Pheromancies at no additional cost and may resolve one Pheromancy each Round: Siphon Strength, Accelerated Hibernation, Pheromantic Drive, Induced Vigor, Pheromantic Compulsion.

specialRules.name: Forward Force
specialRules.description: The non-Monster Regiment this Character Stand is currently attached to gains the Flank Special Rule.

specialRules.name: Flurry
specialRules.description: A Stand with this Special Rule Re-Rolls all failed Hit Rolls when performing a Clash or Duel Action.

specialRules.name: Quicksilver Strike
specialRules.description: A Character Stand with this Special Rule resolves all of its Attacks first during a Duel Action. If both Character Stands in the Duel Action have this Special Rule, the Attacks are resolved simultaneously.

specialRules.name: Right Place - Right Time
specialRules.description: The Character Stand may perform this Action to leave their current Regiment and join another friendly Regiment that they can legally join regardless of the Warband the Regiment belongs to.

specialRules.name: Purity of Purpose
specialRules.description: When this Character Stand performs a Duel Action, until the end of that Action, each failed Defense roll made by the Enemy Character Stand causes two Wounds instead of one. This Special Rule does not stack with the Deadly Blades Special Rule.
